title: Proofreading in Vim
snippet: I have spent a lot of time in Vim writing in LaTex and some Markdown. Functionalities like spell checking are quite important, especially I mostly write stuff in my non-native languages. This article covers, hopefully, every aspect of proofreading LaTex and Markdown in Vim.Vim spell checkingVim i...
